typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		SalesTerritoryKey as integer,
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'SalesTerritory',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> SalesTerritoryDeltaSource
SalesTerritoryDeltaSource aggregate(groupBy(SalesTerritoryKey),
	Group = last(Group),
		Country = last(Country),
		Region = last(Region)) ~> Deduplicated1SalesTerritoryDeltaSource
Deduplicated1SalesTerritoryDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		Group,
		Country,
		Region,
		SalesTerritoryKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SalesTerritory
SalesTerritory select(mapColumn(
		Group,
		Country,
		Region,
		SalesTerritoryKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSalesTerritory
SelectSalesTerritory select(mapColumn(
		Group,
		Country,
		Region,
		TerritoryId = SalesTerritoryKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Territory
Territory sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'Territory',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> TerritorySink
